translations: v．使变窄；使受限制；使陷入困境。
· The economic crisis is straitening the lives of many people.
经济危机使许多人的生活陷入困境。

sentences.sentence: A new method of pure roll straitening is put forward in this article. The problem of straitening to reinforcing stainless steel bar with high surface quality is solved.
sentences.translation: 提出了一种纯滚动矫直的新方法，解决了高表面质量的不锈钢钢筋的无划伤矫直问题。
